Fields.DialogueText: Kapitän, we've just been alerted of a Gruppe of Nixen not far from here.
Good to know. We can rendezvous with the task force off Bergen and...
Actually, I was hoping we might find the time to attack them. I want to show you what I can do now. Really prove to you that I'm... tipptopp in Schuss.

Fields.MenuText: Well, why didn't you just say that? Sounds like a great idea to me.
You should've started with that. I guess we can make a detour if it's that important to you.
I'm not so sure that's a good idea...

Fields.DialogueText: Echt? That's great. I was hoping you'd agree with me.
It is. I want you to know that I'm not going to let any more of my personal... Probleme affect my performance.
Warum nicht? I can - I'm sorry, I was getting worked up. I'm just asking for a Chance, Kapitän.
All right, let's head out and fight some Morganas.
Danke, Kapitän.
No, thank you. I'm really impressed that we didn't end up arguing with each other again.
I'd like to think those arguments are Vergangenheit now, Kapitän.
Let's hope so.
@BATTLE
Nixen upon us. Pack mers?
We've got this.
@BATTLE
You've been doing fantastic work lately, Hipper. I've had nothing but the highest expectations of you, and lately you've been exceeding all of them.
Echt? That means the world to me, Kapitän. Though, if there's anything you're unhappy with about my Leistung, I want you to tell me. I can handle it.
If I'm being honest, Hipper, I wouldn't ask for you to change a thing. This ship is just about perfect in my opinion.
Perfekt? That's crazy, Kapitän. I'm not perfekt. I mean, I'm strong, I'm capable, I can handle any Mission I take on, but perfekt? I'm not sure I'd go that far.

Fields.MenuText: Well, maybe you're not perfect then, but you're pretty damn close.
You don't have to go that far. I did.
Perhaps I misspoke. Sorry if I insulted you or something.

Fields.DialogueText: I'm... Danke, Kapitän. I'm happy you have such a high opinion of me.
Well, if you're going that far, I'll have to work harder to really earn that Lob.
Oh, naa, you didn't insult me or anything, in fact I like to know my efforts are appreciated.
I just don't want to let you down, Kapitän. That's all.
You won't, Hipper. I don't think you could even if you tried.
Well, I would never try!
Hipper, I have some news I think you'll be overjoyed about.
I'm all Ohr, Kapitän.
We've received a new task.
Us specifically?
Exactly. Apparently someone thinks you're perfect for the job.
Heheh, well, I mean I'm perfect for most Aufträge. What are the Einzelheiten?
We've got a group of Morganas causing trouble near the east coast of the U.S. - around the Carolinas. Command doesn't have many details, but they know the group is enough of a threat to ask for help.
Defeating a powerful group of Nixen? That is the perfekte Einsatz for me!

Fields.MenuText: I have to agree.
Someone has a high opinion of herself.
I'll be sure to put that on your gravestone if we lose.

Fields.DialogueText: Well, you'd be stupid not to.
Hey, that's not hilfreich. Do I have to get Doktor Hendrick on the line?
My, I never realized you were such a Pessimist, Kapitän. I thought I had issues.
*ALARM*
Great, more Morganas just when we're about to set off.
Actually, we really should restock im Hafen before going off on our new Mission.
Okay, fine, but let's deal with the problem at hand first.
@BATTLE
I'd really rather you didn't.
Iiiiiieh!
Hipper, what's going on?
I found a Kakerlake in the hall! I had to step on das böse kleine Monster ten times before it finally stopped moving!

Fields.MenuText: A bug? That's what had you screaming bloody murder?
Ewwww, get that thing away from me. I don't want to see all its guts on the floor.
Nice kill, Hipper. Should we have it stuffed and mounted on your wall?

Fields.DialogueText: Not just any Käfer. A huge Kakerlake. It's all over my Stiefel now!
Ugh, don't make me think... ugh. I think I might, bäh, I can't look at it. I don't even want to think about it.
I can't think of anything more disturbing, Kapitän.
This isn't good, Kapitän. This is the beginning of a Plage.
One bug does not an infestation make.
I don't have Käfer. I won't stand for it. And once I find out where this Ungeheuer came from, heads will roll.
*ALARM*
How about we start with a few Morgana heads?
Fine... just let me wash off my Stiefel. I can hear the squishing sound everytime I take a step. Bäh!
@BATTLE
Nixe voraus!
All right - we've got 'em in our sights.
@BATTLE
How's our restocking going? Think we'll have enough supplies to reach our destination?
Ja. Without a doubt. My Mannschaft knows how I like things done by now. I've never run out of any supply on Bord unexpectedly, Kapitän.
Really? That's impressive.
You don't believe me?
No---I mean, of course I---
Verzeihung. I didn't mean to... I'm just a little worked up.
What's wrong?
I've been racking my brain, trying to figure out where that despicable Schabe came from.

Fields.MenuText: You're still on that? Let it go.
Do you need help? I'm right here, you know.
Maybe it was a sea roach. It could've flown aboard. Or burrowed its way through the steel.

Fields.DialogueText: I will not. I'm resolute on this matter. I... I just can not stand Käfer on my Schiff, Kapitän.
Well... I suppose we could work together and check the whole Schiff, Raum für Raum.
Bitte, Kapitän. I'm being very serious. The least you could do is not make Witze.
Uh, Hipper. We have an issue with resupplying the ship with... toilet paper.
What?
Oooh, that's not something you want to run out of on a long voyage.
Give me a Moment, Kapitän. I need to deal with this.
Take your time.
Hey, Hipper, any luck with the infestation?
Kapitän, hush, I'm trying to focus on the Arbeit at hand here.
I'm sorry, say no more. Forget I mentioned the bugs.
Kapitän, no don't... please don't even say the word. It's kind of a rotes Tuch for me. Gets me all... creepy and sick-feeling.
I had no idea. It won't happen again. I don't want to set you off or anything. Any other triggers I should know about?
Hmmmm... None that I can think of. I just... have a thing about this particular Thema.
Well, let's change the subject to something else, something you enjoy.
Einverstanden. Um... have I mentioned that I collect Münzen?
I don't believe so. I wouldn't have guessed something like that from looking at you.
Wirklich? What do I look like I'd collect?

Fields.MenuText: Battle trophies.
Flowers.
No... coins kind of fit you pretty well.

Fields.DialogueText: Schlachtenandenken? Well, I can't say a Orden or two earned in battle wouldn't be nice, but I'm not planning on mounting any Nixenköpfe on sticks or something like that.
Blumen? I don't even have enough time to stop and smell the Rosen, Kapitän.
I'm glad you think so too, Kapitän.
I've collected Münzen for as long as I can remember. It's just a little Steckenpferd I like to do in what little spare time I have.
*ALARM*
And there's the reason for your lack of free time now.
Ja, let's see if we can finish them off quickly. I might have enough time to show you my Sammlung.
It's a collection I'd like to see.
@BATTLE
Hipper, we're approaching the area our targets were last spotted. Their base of operations should be nearby.
I know, I'm just making sure all our supplies are at hand, our Waffen in Ordnung... where did this Fleck come from?
Hipper, why are you... Is now really the time to polish the guns?
This is an important Auftrag, Kapitän. We have to look our best.

Fields.MenuText: Need some help with that?
Maybe if you get it extra shiny, we can just point our guns at the Morganas and blind them.
You know they're just going to get all messy in the battle again, right?

Fields.DialogueText: Nein, it's all right, I've... just about... got it! Alles sauber.
I believe it'd be more effektiv to point and shoot, as it were, Kapitän.
We aren't some common Briganten. We need to keep our Ausrüstung maintained and in pristine Zustand. After Gefecht, I'll get right back to making everything blitzblank.
What were we talking about before, Kapitän? Verzeihung, I got a little distracted.
We're approaching the Morgana base. We need a plan of attack.
*ALARM*
Sounds like it's a little late for that.
We shouldn't be engaging. They must've come out to meet us.
Most likely Aufklärer or something. It'll be a good warm up.
Ready to drop the cleaning rag and grab a gun?
Freili.
@BATTLE
Hipper? What the hell is wrong with you?
THEY'RE CRAWLING WITH KÄFERN!
What? On the deck somewhere?!
Nein, Kapitän, die Nixen! Look - they're writhing all over it! Ekelhaft, ekelhaft, ekelhaft!

Fields.MenuText: Oh, hell. Yeah, I see it. It must be some new bug-like camouflage.
Relax. It's just designs they've painted on their hulls.
Okay, walk me through this. If just saying the word disgusts you, what does looking at a ship covered with them do to you?

Fields.DialogueText: See, it's not just me now. So can we just turn around and head heim now? Yeah, that sounds like a good Idee. Let's do that.
They're not just designs! THEY'RE MOVING! One look and I can feel Fühler all over me. You know, that's how Käfer talk. They're practically licking me!
Nothing good, Kapitän. I just want to fall to my Knie and slink away. Actually, I wanna run away.
*BOOM*
Hipper, I'm gonna need you to snap out of it.
But, did you see---
Yeah, it's covered with bugs, I know. But are you going to let it smash us to pieces? And eat us like breakfast?
Käferfutter?! I don't want to be bug food!
Then use those well polished guns of yours to turn that bug into paste.
But, Kapitän, you...! You're right... I shouldn't be afraid of Käfer... I hate Käfer!
Fire everything we have at that disgusting thing!
There's the Hipper I was looking for.
@BATTLE
Oh, great, we took out the big one, but now we're getting swarmed by all its little friends.
The Dronen come to avenge their Königin...
Hipper... They're not bugs, they're Morganas. Don't freak out on me again.
I hate Insekten. We have to kill all of these disgusting Kreaturen!

Fields.MenuText: Hipper... you're starting to scare me a little.
Damn straight! Let's send them all to bug hell!
I thought you were too scared to fight 'em.

Fields.DialogueText: You're not the one who should be scared. They're the ones who should be quaking at the sight of me!
They'll burn for all eternity once I crush them under my heel!
I'm not afraid of Käfer. I'm not. I just really, really hate them!
Well, she's a little scary, but I guess it's better than shaking at the sight of them.
Hit them with everything we've got! Don't let them get any closer! Kill them all! Schießt sie in Stücke!
You heard the lady!
@BATTLE
Kapitän, I... I really need to apologize for my behavior during that last encounter.
You mean when you were unloading all of our ammo like a madwoman, or when you were almost crying like a baby?
Both, but mostly the second one.

Fields.MenuText: All's well that ends well, ya know?
Well, I wouldn't exactly call your performance commendable.
I didn't realize bugs had such an effect on you.

Fields.DialogueText: Ja, but nein.
But...?
Ja, well, I wish they didn't, but they do, and it happened.
I... shouldn't have reacted that way. We had a Mission, and, while I normalerweise put the Mission above all else, I let my basic Instinkte get the better of me. There is no excuse.
Hipper, you don't need to beat yourself up so much. Everyone has their weaknesses, and as far as I'm concerned, you overcame yours.
I'm not sure I'd say that...
You didn't. I did. I'm proud of you, Hipper.
I... Danke, Kapitän. This has been an uplifting Konversation. I'm going to get right back to work. I won't let you down.
You couldn't let me down if you tried.
We used a lot of supplies in that last encounter. Should I set a course for a Hafen?
I'm certainly not opposed to a port visit, and I trust your judgment. So... your call.
To a Hafen it is. Thank you again, Kapitän.
@BATTLE
Don't worry, I'm getting to that. You can finish your apology first.
All right. I'll get back to it, then.
Ahhhhh, nein, nein, nein, nein, nein, nein, nein, nein, nein, nein!
Hipper, what's going on?
Two of them this time, Kapitän. Two unwelcome blinde Passagiere skittering across the floor.

Fields.MenuText: Oh no... They're multiplying.
Just two? Hardly seems like a problem to me.
Same kind as the last one?

Fields.DialogueText: Eben! Two is all they need to make more.
For every Insekt you see, there are a hundred you don't see. Do the math, Kapitän.
They were creepy and krabbelig. That's all that matters.
Did they run off or did you smash them?
Oh, they're dead. I crushed them under my heel. And now I'm thinking about all the gross guts. Go get me something to wipe it off, Kapitän, bitte!
*ALARM*
Sounds like that'll have to wait. Or better yet, you could wipe them off on the Morganas.
I can't walk all the way to the Deck like this. Just give me your Mantel or something, Kapitän.
Here. Handkerchief. You... don't need to be in a hurry to give it back.
@BATTLE
Hipper, why did you call me down here? And where actually is here?
It's a supply closet. Just look. Bitte.
Why are you hiding behind me? Aren't you supposed to be leading the way?
Just look down, See that Kiste?
Hmmm... You mean this thi---
Don't touch it!
Why - okay, that's a big bug.
That's why we have Käfer, Kapitän! Diese verdammte Kiste!
Did we get them delivered to us or something?
I don't know, I don't know! Just close the Tür before any of those things get out.
My main Theorie is that someone put an extra Kiste of food down here and then forgot about it.
Sounds a little out of character for you. Don't you like to make sure everything's in its place?
That's why it's just a Theorie. It could also be Sabotage...
Like... A prank or something? I suppose there are some mischievous Belles who could've played a trick on you.
Pah, a Schabernack? This was worse than any simple Schabernack. This could mean total war.

Fields.MenuText: If that's what you want, I'm behind you, Hipper.
Aren't you being a little dramatic.
A prank war?! I'm so in!

Fields.DialogueText: That means a lot, Kapitän, but I'd rather not escalate things that quickly. I could be wrong, after all.
I am not being dramatic! I'm responding appropriately to the Situation in the closet!
You seem a little too eager for this, Kapitän. Almost... suspiciously eager...
What are we going to do about our little friends in there?
They are no friends of mine. I'll have an Offizer, or maybe two, handle its disposal. I'll... oversee them from a safe distance to make sure they've destroyed every single one.
Sounds like an important mission. While you're handling that, I'll go make sure we don't run into any Morganas.
I mean, I can fight Nixen, too. I can handle both tasks.
I'll keep that in mind if any trouble arises, Hipper.
@BATTLE
How's our resupply going, Hipper?
Everything's in Ordnung.
And I'm making damn sure that's the case.

Fields.MenuText: That sounds... ominous.
Good. That's the kind of work ethic I like to see from you.
Weren't you before though?

Fields.DialogueText: It's only ominous for any potential six legged Invasoren.
Well, danke, Kapitän. I'm here to please.
Well, ja - but I'm now taking extra measures to insure all of our safety from the Insektengefahr.
So what exactly are these extra measures you're taking?
You know how I can phase through walls? Well, I can also phase through supply Kisten. It's easier to know what exactly you're getting when you can feel it passing through you.
Oh... interesting. What if one of the boxes actually is filled with bugs or something?
Hhhhuuugghh... I didn't... I didn't even think of that.
Well, that's what I'm here for, right?
I'm... I'm going to figure out another way to make sure we're only getting what we're ordering. Blergh!
Still thinking about it?
How could I not be?
@BATTLE
Checking the food stores, Hipper?
Mhmmm, and everything is in its Platz. And it'll stay that way if I have anything to say about it.
Don't you think you might be working yourself a little hard? Maybe you should just stop to take a breath.
I don't have that kind of Luxus, Kapitän. There is just far too much to do in order to keep the Schiff running smoothly.
Not to mention we'll have our next Auftrag soon. That'll keep me even busier.

Fields.MenuText: The ship isn't going to capsize if you take a little time for yourself.
Maybe we could find an easier assignment. Something that won't take so much of your time.
I just want you to be happy, Hipper.

Fields.DialogueText: We don't know that for sure. I'd rather not find out.
I'm not a Zipfler. I can handle hard assignments. I don't want you to think otherwise.
I... I'll be happy when I've earned a Orden or two to pin on my Mantel.
I appreciate your concern, Kapitän, but I can handle the Stress of the Auftrag.
It's not that I wouldn't love to spend an entire day at a Kur, or... at a Masseuse. Oh, that would be heaven... I just have my Prioritäten straight.
I can see that. You always put the mission first, don't you?
Ja. Exactly. Now, until we have a new Auftrag, I have to katalogisieren something. Entschuldige mich.
I'm sure you can handle it, Hipper. That doesn't mean I want you to have all that weight on your shoulders.
@BATTLE
I have some good news for you.
Ja? I am in sore need of something uplifting right about now. Even if it's just a small cup of Rote Grütze.
Rote Grütze? I never took you for a sweet tooth.
It's my Lieblingsessen. One Löffel and all your troubles fade away.
And wait, are you saying you don't think I'm süß?

Fields.MenuText: Sweet? Not especially.
That's not at all what I meant. I think you're adorable!
I'd say you're a little more spicy than sweet.

Fields.DialogueText: Wie ungehobelt! I like to think I can be süß...
Well, danke, Kapitän. You're pretty niedlich yourself.
Würzig? I hope that's a good thing.
Anyway, what's your good Nachrichten?
We have a new mission. It's nothing fancy, but it's a job.
What is it? Another dangerous Gruppe Nixen? Something worse?
I said nothing fancy. We've been assigned to patrol this area. Keep any and all Morganas from causing too much havoc.
Thats... That's it? Were they unhappy with my Leistung?
Not at all. Not every assignment's an epic one, Hipper.
I know... I'm going to... I'm gonna go see if we have any Rote Grütze in the Messe. I have a craving now.
@BATTLE
Schon gut, Kapitän, pack mers. I'm ready for Patrouille.
Hipper, you have a little something by your lip.
Oh. Das tut mir Leid - this is embarrassing. I thought I cleaned up after my... Dessert.
How many cups of Rote Grütze have you had, Hipper?
... More like Schüsseln. I might've gone a little overboard.

Fields.MenuText: That's okay, Hipper. As long as it helped.
I hope you at least saved a little for me.
You're not going to break down and cry on me now, are you, Hipper?

Fields.DialogueText: I think it did. I'm feeling a little better.
I'm not geradeproud about how much I ate, but there should be a little übrig.
Naa, I'd never be caught dead crying. You swallow your feelings like a delicious Schüssel of Rote Grütze and put on a brave face. Anything else would be unseemly.
I war bloß... a little disappointed with myself, as I'm sure our Vorgesetzten were. They clearly wish I had handled that last Auftrag with more grace.
You really shouldn't be thinking of this assignment as a punishment.
Oh, I'm not. Nicht mehr. This is an opportunity. I will perform my Pflicht, better than any Walküre before me.
That's... more like the Hipper I know.
@BATTLE
Kapitän... what did you do to my Kajüte?
You mentioned wishing you could spend an entire day at a spa. This was as close as I could get. Some incense, relaxing music, as many comfy blankets and pillows as I could find. You don't like it?
Nein, ich... I like it. I mean, I appreciate the sentiment, Kapitän. I'm just not sure I... We're supposed to be patrolling for Nixen.
And we will, but that doesn't mean you can't relax at the same time, Hipper.
I'm... It's tempting, Kapitän, but I'm not sure I should be relaxing like this while the Rest of the Mannschaft is working.

Fields.MenuText: You're the spirit of the ship, Hipper. If you're just piling on stress, don't you think the crew feels it?
Everything's running smoothly, Hipper. The ship won't go to hell if you just take a little break.
Am I really going to have to order you to relax?

Fields.DialogueText: You have an exzcellenten point, Kapitän. I wouldn't want to stress out the Schiff.
A Pause does sound tempting, but only a little, tiny, winzige one.
Maybe, I suppose I'd have to listen to you then.
In Ordnung, I'll relax, but if we run into any Ärger, I want to hear about it.
Have you heard our alarm? There's no way you could miss it.
Well, just in case, you better run and get me. Versprich es mir, Kapitän.
I swear. I'll be here before the alarm even goes off. Now, don't make me say it twice. Go relax.
Ja, Kapitän... Danke.
@BATTLE
Oh, Hipper, I thought you'd still be in your room.
I think I've had enough of a Pause. I really appreciate everything you did, but I think I'm ready to get back to it.
Well, how do you feel? Did it at least help you relax a little?
I feel like a new Person, Kapitän.

Fields.MenuText: Really? You're not just putting on a front?
I'm glad to hear that it wasn't a waste of time.
Hopefully not completely new. I'm pretty attached to the Hipper I know.

Fields.DialogueText: Nein. I really do feel a lot besser, Kapitän.
I'm just relieved that the Schiff didn't break auseinander without me.
Wirklich? You don't have to worry about that. I'm still me.
Ehrlich gesagt, I can't remember the last time I was able to sleep so easily, but it's still not exactly the same thing as a Kurbad.
Yeah, I wish I could've done a better job.
Oh, that's not what I meant! I loved it, Kapitän. Bloß... I can only sit in my Kajüte for so long before I get a little Lagerkoller.
Yeah, I can understand that.
*ALARM*
Well, lucky for you, there always seems to be something to do on this ship.
Or at least something to zerstören out there.
@BATTLE
So, how are you feeling about patrol, Hipper? It's not that bad, right?
There are more Nixen in the Gegend than I imagined. It could be worse.
I'm glad we see eye to eye. I was starting to think I might've chosen the wrong assignment.
Moment mal... What do you mean "chosen?" I thought we were assigned this Patrouille.

Fields.MenuText: Oh, I... uh...
Why would you think that? Sounds like you made an assumption.
They did. What did I say?

Fields.DialogueText: Spuck es aus, Kapitän! I'm waiting.
Was?! Are you saying that it's my Fehler? You misled me!
You said you chose it. Did you? Don't lüg to me, Kapitän.
Okay, I might've taken a less dangerous job. It's not that big of a deal.
Warum? Do you think I can't handle the more powerful Nixen?
That's not it, Hipper. Hunting those monsters is exhausting, you know. It takes it out of you. We all needed a little time to catch our breath.
I feel like you're making excuses. You shouldn't keep me off the vordersten Front just because of that one... Käfernixe.
It's not about that, Hipper. I know how strong you are. I wasn't being overprotective or anything.
*seufz* I should get back to Patrouille. We never know when more Nixen could show up.
... Dammit.
@BATTLE
Nixen upon us. Shall we?
We've got this.
@BATTLE
Kapitän, I heard a disturbing Gerücht while we were restocking.

Fields.MenuText: Is it going to keep us here much longer? We have to get back to patrol at some point.
Was it about the cheese? I thought it might've been a little rancid.
I didn't know you were interested in gossip, Hipper.

Fields.DialogueText: It's actually about our Patrouille. It was a Gerücht about a terrifying Nixe.
Naa, it's not about the Kas. It's supposed to smell like that.
It wasn't a Gerücht like that. It was about a Bedrohung.
From what I hear, there's a Nixe nearby that's been attacking and destroying any Schiff that wanders too close to it.
Sounds dangerous. This... isn't about trying to prove yourself, is it?
If I lied and said it wasn't, would you believe me?
No, I probably wouldn't. How dangerous is this Morgana?
It's already destroyed countless Schiffe. Isn't this the kind of thing we're patouillieren for?
You're not wrong. Plus, it also sounds like the kind of thing that would earn reward and recognition for whoever vanquishes it.
Only one more reason to go after it then.
I figured that would be your main reason.
Nein. My Hauptgrund is to prove to you that I still have what it takes.
How many times have I told you I know how strong you are, Hipper?
Not enough. I still don't believe you.
Let's go, then. I suppose we have a Morgana to defeat.
Wow.
Look at that. I didn't know Morganas came in super size.
I hope we restocked enough back at the Hafen.

Fields.MenuText: I'm sure we did. After all, you've never run out of supplies, Hipper.
You're worrying about this now? Should we turn back or something?
It's a little late now. Let's cross our fingers.

Fields.DialogueText: Stimmt. And I'm not planning on starting now.
Naa, I'm just a little nervös. It's normal before battle.
That doesn't really work, does it, Kapitän?
Wait, look over there. Is that a wreck?
It must be the Nixens previous Opfer. It looks fresh.
We should do our best to rescue any survivors.
My thoughts exactly, Kapitän. Now, we have no time to waste. Let's knock this Nixe down to size.
@BATTLE
Hipper, you were phenomenal in that last fight.
I don't feel phänomenal.
I feel like I was an Explosionsmagnet.

Fields.MenuText: So you walked away with a few scars. You know, scars can be quite attractive.
You saved dozens of survivors while fending off the attacks of a mountainous Morgana. It was commendable.
You might've taken a few hits, but the final strike was yours. And that's the most important part.

Fields.DialogueText: Waa---Attraktiv? Ist... I mean, is that what gefällt dir, Kapitän?
It was about the size of a Berg, wasn't it? You should be sure to note that in your Rapport.
In the end, we won. It makes the Schrammen ache a little less.
Have I redeemed myself now? It's obvious I can handle more powerful Nixen, gell?
Hipper, I know... Okay, I get it. We can talk about taking some more dangerous jobs.
Ja? Really?! Now, that is a load off my Brust. I feel so relieved.
That makes you relieved? The prospect of risking your life fighting monsters?
It's not just that. It's a relief knowing that you really do have Vertrauen in me, Kapitän.
Well, I'm just glad you finally seem to believe me.
I guess it's just hard to believe someone else when you don't believe yourself.
Anyway, we should really head back to Hafen. After that Kampf, we're in sore need of just about everything.
Hipper... I guess you're more insecure than I realized behind that brave face of yours.
@BATTLE
I'm interested in a lot of things. Including how well you fought in that battle.
Everything is just going perfekt, Kapitän. I couldn't be happier.
I know you love making sure everything is perfectly in place during our resupplies, but I've never seen it make you this happy.
That's not why I'm happy, Kapitän. Everything is just looking brighter lately.
You're trusting me to take on stronger Nixen again, there haven't been any other Viecher skittering aboard, and I can't remember the last time we had a big Hader.

Fields.MenuText: For the umpteenth time, I always trusted you, Hipper.
You sure we're completely pest free? We could have termites chewing through the ship as we speak.
Did we ever fight? I remember it more like cute little spats.

Fields.DialogueText: Regardless, I'm still happy about it.
Do you think this is a Segelboot? I think one of the last things a Kriegsschiff has to worry about is Termiten.
You know, looking back, our fights do seem more... verspielt.
I really can't wait to take down a bunch more super strong Nixen. When we report back in, the Orden will just be rolling in!
Is that really the most important thing to you, Hipper?
I... I wouldn't say it's the most important thing. It's certainly up there though.
If you could be anywhere right now, where would you be?
Überall? Hmmmm, that's a question.
*ALARM*
I really hope you weren't about to say fighting Morganas.
Eigentlich, I was thinking about it, but it seemed like too easy an answer.
I blame you for this.
Take some time to think. I'm expecting a real answer after the battle.
@BATTLE
Bad Kissingen.
Excuse me? Was that a sneeze?
Nein. If I could be anywhere in the world, that's where I'd be. It's a small town in Bayern. It's famous for its Heilbäder. They have the most wonderful Kurbäder there.

Fields.MenuText: I guess my spa wasn't good enough for you, huh?
Healing springs? You think they'd have the same effect on a Belle?
I have to say, I wasn't expecting that, seeing as how I had to force you to take your last break.

Fields.DialogueText: It was wonderful, Kapitän, but we're talking about one of the best Kurbäder in all of Germany.
I would hope so. One of the things they are known to heal is the Geist, and I am the Geist of the Schiff. It should work.
I'm a very komplizierte Frau, Kapitän.
Just the thought of spending a day or two away from all the expectations and pressures of war... I can't even imagine how wonderful that would feel.
It certainly sounds like a dream. I'd love to experience it myself.
If only it was closer to the coast. With my current circumstances, it's going to have to stay a Hirngespinst.
For now. One day, I'm sure we'll get you to Bad Nenndorf. See if those healing springs have the same effect on you or not.
If anyone else was saying that, I'd discount it completely, but since it's you, I'm starting to think it might be possible.
@BATTLE
Nixen appearing before us.
All right -- we've got 'em in our sights.
@BATTLE
Kapitän, I heard we have a new heading. Do we have a new Auftrag?
I've communicated to the powers that be that we're ready to take on more dangerous assignments, but for now, we're still on patrol.
Oh, that's too bad. Where are we going then?
Northern Germany. We're getting as close to Bad Kissingen as we can get you.
What? That's insane! You're going to run the Schiff aground.

Fields.MenuText: I'm not gonna go that far. I'm not a lunatic.
Anything for you, Hipper. I'll put wheels on this ship and drive there if I have to.
Oh, ye of little faith. Don't you trust me by now?

Fields.DialogueText: I wouldn't call you a Wahnsinniger, but you can certainly act verrückt sometimes. Jetzt zum Beispiel.
Was---Anything?! That's... Wait, we weigh 16,000 Tonnen, Kapitän. They haven't made Räder that could handle that kind of Gewicht.
You know I do. I just don't know what's going on in your head sometimes.
You don't have to worry so much, Hipper. From what I've heard there are seaspas directly at the coast. It might not be Bad Kissingen, but it'll do for now.
And after we've had our spa day, we'll hopefully have our new Morgana to hunt.
Des is doch... also, Kapitän. You don't need to do all this for me.
I don't need to. I want to. I want to give you everything you deserve, Hipper. And you deserve everything you want.
Aber... why?
I have feelings for you. One could say I've fallen for you.
Du... You've fallen for me?
That's what I said. Now let's sidestep the awkwardness and get straight to that seaspa.
You don't have to say anything, I don't want to pressure you into--
Nein, I feel natürlich the same way about you. I just never thought you'd... Why me?
We really need to work on your self confidence.
I'm plenty confident.
Well, you pretend to be. But if you saw the Hipper that I see, then I'd like to think it'd be real confidence.
When did you get so good at Süßholzraspeln? You're making me blush. I'm a Krieger, I don't blush.
Get used to it. I'm not planning on stopping anytime soon.
Let's hurry to the Seebad then. That way I can at least hide in the Kurbecken.
If you're going to hide that beautiful face, I don't want to go as badly!
Hör auf, bitte! Stop it! I don't want the Mannschaft to see me like this. And we haven't decided where to!
